sentences.en: In the east there is the slightest glimmer of light.
sentences.cn: 东方有一丝闪烁的微光。

sentences.en: Despite an occasional glimmer of hope, this campaign has not produced any results.
sentences.cn: 尽管偶尔有一线希望，这次宣传活动并没有产生任何结果。

sentences.en: How glad he was when at last he caught the glimmer of a light!
sentences.cn: 当他终于看到一丝光亮时，他是多么高兴啊！
